title: Sillim/m/22
description:
Description :
        "I wasn't supposed to go there in the first place."

‘Hyuk’, who started ‘Anonymous Chat’ because he was lonely,

He even has drinks with strangers to relieve his loneliness.

Then one day, news broke that one of the people attending the meeting had been killed.

‘Hyuk’ feels suspicious as he reunites with the people he had been drinking with on the same day...

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 1: You Wanna Do It, Right?
